title: [Minecraft.net|MINECRAFT BUILDS] Cozy Corner Village 村庄舒适一角

Cozy Corner Village
村庄舒适一角

Constructed by Luki
由Luki铸造



Taking up a mere corner of a custom-designed 5000x5000 block survival map, this village by Luki joins detailed desert temples, pillager outposts, and ocean monuments. With strategic pathway lighting and flowers cheerfully arranged outside the houses, this village appears to be a welcoming corner for any adventurer in need of a break
这座由Luki建造的村庄仅仅占据了5000x5000格的定制生存地图的一个小角落，却融入了沙漠神庙、掠夺者前哨站和海底遗迹这些景观。房屋外的路径光照布局和盛开的繁花使得这座村庄流露出一股欢迎任何需要驻足休息的冒险家的气息。
Have you built something spectacular? Send your screenshots (and any other information we might find helpful) to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and keep an eye on future articles!

你有什么值得分享的宏伟建筑吗？将你的截图 (和其它有用的具体信息)发送到FeatureMe@minecraft.net并留意今后我们的文章吧！

replies.txt_content: 可以可以，我先玩玩试试
